m_szDocTitle: Pair Of 44 MPG Range Rover Hybrids Debut | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Pair Of 44 MPG Range Rover Hybrids Debut Originally published on Gas2 . by Christopher DeMorro Land Rover is one of the biggest names in the SUV game, despite constant mechanical malfunctions and the legendary British electrical gremlins. While the British automaker has rolled outÂ  an electric Defender that serves as a glorified cart hauler , Land Rover has not had a hybrid until now, debuting a pair of Range Rover Hybrids that deliver great acceleration and a combined 44 mpg.
